alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Goshen County; Laramie Valley; Niobrara County; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 2:09AM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY MORNING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, Niobrara County, Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin, East Platte County, Goshen County, Central Carbon County, Laramie Valley, Central Laramie County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Goshen County; Laramie Valley; Niobrara County; Shirley Basin
